# MarketplaceV3DirectListings.getAllValid() method

Get all valid direct listings

A valid listing is where the listing is active, and the creator still owns &amp; has approved Marketplace to transfer the listed NFTs.

## Example

```javascript
const listings = await contract.directListings.getAllValid();
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
getAllValid(filter?: MarketplaceFilter): Promise<DirectListingV3[]>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                            | Description                             |
| --------- | ----------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- |
| filter    | [MarketplaceFilter](./sdk.marketplacefilter.md) | _(Optional)_ optional filter parameters |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[DirectListingV3](./sdk.directlistingv3.md)\[\]&gt;

the Direct listing object array
